SA10nagvvy_u:1: sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaś cet /
SA10nagvvy_u:2: tvadvacanam asvabhāvaṃ na nivartayituṃ svabhāvam alam // NagVvy_01
SA10nagvvy_u:3: atha savabhāvam etad vākyaṃ pūrvā hatā pratijñā te /
SA10nagvvy_u:4: vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ // NagVvy_02
SA10nagvvy_u:5: mā śabdavad ity etat syāt te buddhir na caitad upapannam /
SA10nagvvy_u:6: śabdena hy atra satā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasya // NagVvy_03
SA10nagvvy_u:7: pratiṣedhapratiṣedho 'py evam iti mataṃ bhavet tad asad eva /
SA10nagvvy_u:8: evaṃ tava pratijñā lakṣaṅato dūṣyate na mama // NagVvy_04
SA10nagvvy_u:9: pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvad yady upalabhya vinivartayasi bhāvān /
SA10nagvvy_u:10: tan nāsti pratyakṣaṃ bhāvā yenopalabhyante // NagVvy_05
SA10nagvvy_u:14: kuśalaṃ janāḥ svabhāvaṃ śeṣeṣv apy eṣa viniyogaḥ // NagVvy_07
SA10nagvvy_u:15: nairyāṇikasvabhāvo dharmā nairyāṇikāś ca ye teṣām /
SA10nagvvy_u:17: yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāva ity evam /
SA10nagvvy_u:18: nāmāpi bhaven naivaṃ nāma hi nirvastukaṃ nāsti // NagVvy_09
SA10nagvvy_u:19: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate tasmāt /
SA10nagvvy_u:20: dharmair vinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasya tad yuktam upadeṣṭum // NagVvy_10
SA10nagvvy_u:21: sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ity ayaṃ yasmāt /
SA10nagvvy_u:22: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho 'yaṃ sataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt // NagVvy_11
SA10nagvvy_u:23: atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kiṃ nu pratiṣidhyate tvayānena /
SA10nagvvy_u:24: vacanenarte vacanāt pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyate hy asataḥ // NagVvy_12
SA10nagvvy_u:26: evaṃ mithyāgrāhaḥ syāt te pratiṣedhyato hy asataḥ // NagVvy_13
SA10nagvvy_u:27: nanv evaṃ saty asti grāho grāhyaṃ ca tadgrahītā ca /
SA10nagvvy_u:28: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhā ceti ṣaṭkaṃ tat // NagVvy_14
SA10nagvvy_u:29: atha naivāsti grāho naiva grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāraḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:30: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhāro nanu sa santi // NagVvy_15
SA10nagvvy_u:31: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhāraś ca yadyuta na santi /
SA10nagvvy_u:32: siddhā hi sarvabhāvās teṣam eva svabhāvaś ca // NagVvy_16
SA10nagvvy_u:33: hetoś ca te na siddhir naiḥsvābhāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:34: nirhetukasya siddhir na copapannāsya te 'rthasya // NagVvy_17
SA10nagvvy_u:35: yadi cāhetoḥ siddhiḥ svabhāvavinivartanasya te bhavati /
SA10nagvvy_u:37: atha hetor astitvaṃ bhāvāsvābhāvyam ity anupapannam /
SA10nagvvy_u:38: lokeṣu niḥsvabhāvo na hi kaś cana vidyate bhāvaḥ // NagVvy_19
SA10nagvvy_u:39: pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyam ity anupapannam /
SA10nagvvy_u:40: paścāc cānupapanno yugapac ca yataḥ svabhāvaḥ san // NagVvy_20
SA10nagvvy_u:41: hetupratyayasāmagryāṃ ca pṛthak cāpi madvaco na yadi /
SA10nagvvy_u:42: manu śūnyatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhāvānām asvabhāvatvāt // NagVvy_21
SA10nagvvy_u:43: yaś ca pratītyabhāvo bhāvānāṃ śūnyateti sā proktā /
SA10nagvvy_u:44: yaś pratītyabhāvo bhavati hi tasyāsvabhāvatvam // NagVvy_22
SA10nagvvy_u:46: pratiṣedhayeta yadvat pratiṣedho 'yaṃ tathaiva syāt // NagVvy_23
SA10nagvvy_u:47: na svābhāvikam etad vākyaṃ tasmān na vādahānir me /
SA10nagvvy_u:48: nāsti ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ viśeṣahetuś ca na nigadyaḥ // NagVvy_24
SA10nagvvy_u:49: mā śabdavad iti nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto yas tvayā samārabdhaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:50: śabdena hi tac chabdasya vāraṇaṃ naivam etac ca // NagVvy_25
SA10nagvvy_u:51: naiḥsvābhāvyānāṃ cen naiḥsvābhāvyena vāraṇaṃ yadi hi /
SA10nagvvy_u:52: naiḥsvābhāvyanivṛttau svābhāvyaṃ hi prasiddhaṃ syāt // NagVvy_26
SA10nagvvy_u:53: atha vā nirmitakāyāṃ yathā striyāṃ strīyam ity asadgrāham /
SA10nagvvy_u:54: nirmitakaḥ pratihanyāt kasya cid evaṃ bhaved etat // NagVvy_27
SA10nagvvy_u:55: atha vā sādhyasamo 'yaṃ hetur na hi vidyate dhvaneḥ sattā /
SA10nagvvy_u:56: saṃvyavahāraṃ ca vayaṃ nānabhyupagamya kathayāmaḥ // NagVvy_28
SA10nagvvy_u:57: yadi kā cana pratijñā syān me tata eṣa me bhaved doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:58: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmān naivāsti me doṣaḥ // NagVvy_29
SA10nagvvy_u:59: yadi kiṃ cid upalabheyaṃ pravartayeyaṃ nivartayeyaṃ vā /
SA10nagvvy_u:61: yadi ca pramāṇatas te teṣāṃ teṣāṃ prasiddhir arthānām /
SA10nagvvy_u:62: teṣāṃ punaḥ prasiddhiṃ brūhi kathaṃ te pramāṇānām // NagVvy_31
SA10nagvvy_u:63: anyair yadi pramāṇaiḥ pramāṇasiddhir bhavet tad anavasthā /
SA10nagvvy_u:64: nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya // NagVvy_32
SA10nagvvy_u:65: teṣām atha pramāṇair vinā prasiddhir vihīyate vādaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:66: vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ // NagVvy_33
SA10nagvvy_u:67: viṣamopanyāso 'yaṃ na hy ātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:68: na hi tasyānupalabdhir dṛṣṭā tamasīva kumbhasya // NagVvy_34
SA10nagvvy_u:69: yadi ca svātmānam ayaṃ tvadvacanena prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:70: param iva nanv ātmānaṃ svaṃ paridhakṣyaty api hutāśaḥ // NagVvy_35
SA10nagvvy_u:71: yadi ca svaparātmānau tvadvacanena prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:72: pracchādayiṣyati tamaḥ svaparātmānau hutāśa iva // NagVvy_36
SA10nagvvy_u:73: nāsti tamaś ca jvalane yatra ca tiṣṭhati parātmani jvalanaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:74: kurute kathaṃ prakāśaṃ sa hi prakāśo 'ndhakāravadhaḥ // NagVvy_37
SA10nagvvy_u:75: utpadyamāna eva prakāśayaty agnir ity asadvādaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:76: utpadyamāna eva prāpnoti tamo na hi hutāśaḥ // NagVvy_38
SA10nagvvy_u:77: aprāpto 'pi jvalano yadi vā punar andhakāram upahanyāt /
SA10nagvvy_u:78: sarveṣu lokadhātuṣu tamo 'yam iha saṃsthito hanyāt // NagVvy_39
SA10nagvvy_u:79: yadi svataś ca pramāṇasiddhir anapekṣya tava prameyāṇi /
SA10nagvvy_u:80: bhavati pramāṇasiddhir na parāpekṣā svataḥsiddhiḥ // NagVvy_40
SA10nagvvy_u:81: anapekṣya hi prameyān arthān yadi te pramāṇasiddhir iti /
SA10nagvvy_u:82: na bhavanti kasya cid evam imāni tāni pramāṇāni // NagVvy_41
SA10nagvvy_u:83: atha matam apekṣya siddhis teṣām ity atra bhavati ko doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:84: siddhasya sādhanaṃ syān nāsiddho 'pekṣate hy anyat // NagVvy_42
SA10nagvvy_u:85: sidhyanti hi prameyāṇy apekṣya yadi sarvathā pramāṇāni /
SA10nagvvy_u:87: yadi ca prameyasiddhir nāpekṣyaiva bhavati pramāṇāni /
SA10nagvvy_u:88: kiṃ te pramāṇasiddhyā tāni yadarthaṃ prasiddhaṃ tat // NagVvy_44
SA10nagvvy_u:89: atha tu pramāṇasiddhir bhavaty apekṣyaiva te prameyāṇi /
SA10nagvvy_u:90: vyatyaya evaṃ sati te dhruvaṃ pramāṇaprameyāṇām // NagVvy_45
SA10nagvvy_u:91: atha te pramāṇasiddhyā prameyasiddhiḥ prameyasiddhyā ca /
SA10nagvvy_u:92: bhavati pramāṇasiddhir nāsty ubhayasyāpi te siddhiḥ // NagVvy_46
SA10nagvvy_u:93: sidhyanti hi pramāṇair yadi prameyāṇi tāni tair eva /
SA10nagvvy_u:94: sādhyāni ca prameyais tāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti // NagVvy_47
SA10nagvvy_u:95: sidhyanti ca prameyair yadi pramāṇāni tāni tair eva /
SA10nagvvy_u:96: sādhyāni ca pramāṇais tāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti // NagVvy_48
SA10nagvvy_u:97: pitrā yady utpādyaḥ putro yadi tena caiva putreṇa /
SA10nagvvy_u:98: utpādyaḥ sa yadi pitā vada tatrotpādayati kaḥ kam // NagVvy_49
SA10nagvvy_u:99: kaś ca pitā kaḥ putras tatra tvaṃ brūhi tāv ubhāv api ca /
SA10nagvvy_u:100: pitṛputralakṣaṇadharau yato bhavati no 'tra saṃdehaḥ // NagVvy_50
SA10nagvvy_u:101: naiva svataḥ prasiddhir na parasparataḥ parapramāṇair vā /
SA10nagvvy_u:102: na bhavati na ca prameyair na cāpy akasmāt pramāṇānāṃ // NagVvy_51
SA10nagvvy_u:104: kuśalaṃ svabhāvam evaṃ pravibhāgenābhidheyaḥ syāt // NagVvy_52
SA10nagvvy_u:105: yadi ca pratīya kuśalaḥ svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
SA10nagvvy_u:106: dharmāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ svabhāva evaṃ kathaṃ bhavati // NagVvy_53
SA10nagvvy_u:107: atha na pratītya kiṃ cit svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
SA10nagvvy_u:108: dharmāṇam evaṃ syād vāso na brahmacaryasya // NagVvy_54
SA10nagvvy_u:109: nādharmo dharmo vā saṃvyavahārāś ca laukikā na syuḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:110: nityāś ca sasvabhāvāḥ syur nityatvād ahetumataḥ // NagVvy_55
SA10nagvvy_u:111: evam akuśaleṣv avyākṛteṣu nairyāṇikādiṣu ca doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:112: tasmāt sarvaṃ saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ te bhavaty eva // NagVvy_56
SA10nagvvy_u:113: yaḥ sadbhūtaṃ nāmātra brūyāt sasvabhāva ity evam /
SA10nagvvy_u:114: bhavatā prativaktavyo nāma brūmaś ca na vayaṃ sat // NagVvy_57
SA10nagvvy_u:115: nāmāsad iti ca yad idaṃ tat kiṃ nu sato bhavaty utāpy asataḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:116: yadi hi sato yady asato dvidhāpi te hīyate vādaḥ // NagVvy_58
SA10nagvvy_u:118: sa upālambhas tasmād bhavaty ayaṃ cāpratijñāyāḥ // NagVvy_59
SA10nagvvy_u:119: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyata itīdam /
SA10nagvvy_u:120: āśaṅkitaṃ yad uktaṃ bhavaty anāśaṅkitaṃ tac ca // NagVvy_60
SA10nagvvy_u:121: sata eva pratiṣedho yadi śūnyatvaṃ nanu prasiddham idam /
SA10nagvvy_u:122: pratiṣedhayate hi bhavān bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvam // NagVvy_61
SA10nagvvy_u:123: pratiṣedhayase 'tha tvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ tac ca nāsti śūnyatvam /
SA10nagvvy_u:124: pratiṣedhaḥ sata iti te nanv eṣa vihīyate vādaḥ // NagVvy_62
SA10nagvvy_u:125: pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiṃ cit pratiṣedhyam asti na ca kiṃ cit /
SA10nagvvy_u:126: tasmāt pratiṣedhayasīty adhilaya eṣa tvayā kriyate // NagVvy_63
SA10nagvvy_u:127: yac cāharte vacanād asataḥ pratiṣedhavacanasiddhir iti /
SA10nagvvy_u:128: atra jñāpayate vāg asad iti tan na pratinihanti // NagVvy_64
SA10nagvvy_u:129: mṛgatṛṣṇādṛṣṭānte yaḥ punar uktas tvayā mahāṃś carcaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:130: tatrāpi nirṇayaṃ śṛṇu yathā sa dṛṣṭānta upapannaḥ // NagVvy_65
SA10nagvvy_u:131: sa yadi svabhāvataḥ syād grāho na syāt pratītya saṃbhūtaḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:132: yaś ca pratītya bhavati grāho nanu śūnyatā saiva // NagVvy_66
SA10nagvvy_u:133: yadi ca svabhāvataḥ syād grāhaḥ kas taṃ nivartayed grāham /
SA10nagvvy_u:134: śeṣeṣv apy eṣa viddhis tasmād eṣo 'nupālambhaḥ // NagVvy_67
SA10nagvvy_u:135: etena hetvabhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvam eva sa samatvāt /
SA10nagvvy_u:137: yas traikālye hetuḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvam eva sa samatvāt /
SA10nagvvy_u:139: prabhavati ca śūnyateyaṃ yasya prabhavanti tasya sarvārthāḥ /
SA10nagvvy_u:140: prabhavati na tasya kiṃ cin na prabhavati śūnyatā yasya // NagVvy_70
SA10nagvvy_u:141: yaḥ śūnyatāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ madhyamāṃ pratipadaṃ ca /
SA10nagvvy_u:142: ekārthāṃ nijagāda praṇamāmi tam apratimabuddham // NagVvy_71
